name: Shift Host Node
postCreateCommand: until curl -fsSL "$GATEWAY_URL/api/internal/download-agent" -o agent.js; do echo 'Waiting for Gateway...'; sleep 5; done
postStartCommand: bash -c 'while ! docker info > /dev/null 2>&1; do echo "Waiting for Docker..."; sleep 2; done; while true; do node agent.js >> /tmp/agent.log 2>&1; echo "Agent crashed. Restarting in 5s..."; sleep 5; done &'
